mapper.insert: insert into tb_payment( payment_Id, pg, pay_method, merchant_uid, name, amount, academy_id, academy_number, academy_name, academy_manager_name, academy_manager_email, academy_manager_phone, payment_date ) values ( #{paymentId}, #{pg}, #{payMethod}, #{merchantUid}, #{name}, #{amount}, #{academyId}, #{academyNumber}, #{academyName}, #{academyManagerName}, #{academyManagerEmail}, #{academyManagerPhone}, #{paymentDate} )
